title: iOS 15.4 beta 5 now available to developers with new Siri voice, Face ID mask unlock, more
content:
iOS 15.4 is almost ready for public launch as Apple is releasing beta 5 of this upcoming software update today. The company also has a new beta of iPadOS 15.4. Head below for the full details on these latest releases from Apple. 

more…

The post iOS 15.4 beta 5 now available to developers with new Siri voice, Face ID mask unlock, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: iOS 15.4 is almost ready for public launch as Apple is releasing today beta 5 of this upcoming software update. Here's everything new with it.
